member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.Discovery
member.summary: A discovery motif.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.Discovery.AttackedPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the piece being attacked.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.Discovery.MovedPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the piece that moved to unleash the AttackingPiece.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.Discovery.AttackingPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the piece that was unleashed to do the attacking.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.Discovery.Check
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this move puts the opponent in check.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.DiscoveryAnalyzer
member.summary: Identifies discovered attacks.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.DiscoveryAnalyzer.FindDiscoveriesForMoveAndSequence(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,Artemis.Sequences.Sequence{Artemis.Model.Square})
member.summary: Find a discovery in a specific sequence.
member.returns: The list of discoveries in this sequence.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.DiscoveryAnalyzer.GetSearchSequencesForSquare(Artemis.Model.Square)
member.summary: Returns a list of subsequences that consists of the subsequence in the rank direction, file direction, and both diagonals.
member.returns: The list of subsequences.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Discovery.DiscoveryAnalyzer.FindMotifsInPositionAsync(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Artemis.Model.Square,System.Int32})
member.summary: Finds the discovery motifs in a given position.
member.returns: The list of discoveries.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.PassedPawn.Breakthrough
member.summary: A tactic where several pawns are moved to create a passed pawn.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.PassedPawn.BreakthroughAnalyzer
member.summary: An analyzer to find pawn breakthroughs leading to a passed pawn.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.PassedPawn.PassedPawnUtils
member.summary: Utility class with useful methods for passed-pawn related tactics.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.PassedPawn.PassedPawnUtils.IsPotentialRunnerAnActualRunner(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,Artemis.Model.PositionSquare,Artemis.Model.PositionSquare)
member.summary: Determines whether the path for a potential runner to make diagonal contact with a keeper is clear.
member.returns: True if the runner pawn has nothing in between itself and the keeper pawn diagonal.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.PassedPawn.PassedPawnUtils.FindPotentialRunners(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,Artemis.Model.PositionSquare)
member.summary: Finds all the pawns that the given pawn is preventing from being a passed pawn.
member.returns: The list of potential runners.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.PassedPawn.PassedPawnUtils.IsPawnPassed(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,Artemis.Model.PositionSquare)
member.summary: Determines whether a pawn in a given position is a passed pawn.
member.param: The current position of the board.
member.returns: True if the pawn is passed.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin
member.summary: A situation where one side is attacking another's sides piece A, and a piece B of higher value makes it disadvantageous, or even illegal, for them to move piece A.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin.PinningPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the piece doing the pinning.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin.PinnedPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the piece being pinned.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin.ValuablePiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the valuable piece who enabled this pin.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin.PinType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of pin, relative or absolute.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin.TacticType
member.summary: Gets the type of tactic. For this subclass, it is always Pin..

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer
member.summary: Finds instances of the "Pin" tactical motif.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer.IdentifyPinsInPosition(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition)
member.summary: Identifies a list of pins in a position.
member.param: The position to search for pins in.
member.returns: A list of pins found.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer.IdentifyPinsInSequenceAndPosition(Artemis.Sequences.Sequence{Artemis.Model.PositionSquare},Artemis.Model.FlatPosition)
member.summary: Uses easy to compute criteria to determine if this sequence might have a pin. More exhaustive checks are done only on sequences that pass this first test.
member.param: The sequence to search for pins.
The current position of the board. Needed for context about the pinned piece.
member.returns: False if we know for certain the sequence cannot contain a pin.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer.GeneratePotentialSubsequences(Artemis.Sequences.Sequence{Artemis.Model.PositionSquare})
member.summary:
For each sequare in this sequence, examine the piece occupying that square (if any). If the piece is a valid piece type for this sequence type, then up to two subsequences are added:
Starting with the potentially pinning piece, going to the end of the sequence.
Starting with the potentially pinning piece, going backwards to the start of the sequence.
member.param: The full sequence to split into potential subsequences for pin analysis.
member.returns: A list of the identified subsequences for further analysis.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer.FindPinOrNull(Artemis.Sequences.Sequence{Artemis.Model.PositionSquare})
member.summary: Finds a pin, if there is one present, in the subsequence.
member.param: The subsequence to check for a pin, where the first element is occupied by the piece doing the pinning.
member.returns: The pin object if a pin is found. Otherwise, null.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer.IsPinPreventingPieceFromOtherwiseMoving(Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin,Artemis.Model.FlatPosition)
member.summary: Checks if an already-identified pin is actually preventing a piece from moving. In other words, is the set of legal moves for the pinned piece bigger if the pin was removed?.
member.returns: True if the pin is actually restricting the movement of the pinned piece.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer.DoesMoveInPositionAllowPinningPieceToCaptureValuablePiece(Artemis.Tactics.Pins.Pin,Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,ChessBot.Logic.Moves.Move)
member.summary: Determines whether a given move for the pinned piece would allow the pinning piece to capture the valuable piece. If a pin doesn't actually restrict the "ability" for a piece to move (without material loss or making an illegal move for relative and absolute pins respectively), then it isn't really a pin by human standards.
member.returns: True if the given move allows the capture.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinAnalyzer.FindMotifsInPositionAsync(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Artemis.Model.Square,System.Int32})
member.summary: Finds all the pins in a position.
member.returns: A list of pins.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinType
member.summary: The type of pin identified in a position.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinType.Absolute
member.summary: A pin where a piece is attacked that cannot legally move (i.e. involving the King).

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.Pins.PinType.Relative
member.summary: A pin where a piece is attacked that can legally move, but whose doing so will cost material

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.Skewer
member.summary: A skewer tactic.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.Skewer.SkeweringPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the piece performing the skewer.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.Skewer.SkeweredPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the piece being skewered.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.Skewer.CasualtyPiece
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the piece behind the skewered piece.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.Skewer.TacticType
member.summary: Gets the type of tactic. For this subclass, it is always Skewer..

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.SkewerAnalyzer
member.summary: Identifies skewers in the position.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.SkewerAnalyzer.IdentifySkewersInPosition(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition)
member.summary: Identifies a list of pins in a position.
member.param: The position to search for pins in.
member.returns: A list of pins found.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.SkewerAnalyzer.IdentifySkewersInSequenceAndPosition(Artemis.Sequences.Sequence{Artemis.Model.PositionSquare},Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Artemis.Model.Square,System.Int32})
member.summary: Uses easy to compute criteria to determine if this sequence might have a skewer. More exhaustive checks are done only on sequences that pass this first test.
member.param: The sequence to search for skewer.
The current position of the board. Needed for context about the pinned piece.
If already computed, the coverage map. Otherwise will be computed.
member.returns: False if we know for certain the sequence cannot contain a skewer.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.SkewerAnalyzer.GeneratePotentialSubsequences(Artemis.Sequences.Sequence{Artemis.Model.PositionSquare})
member.summary:
For each sequare in this sequence, examine the piece occupying that square (if any). If the piece is a valid piece type for this sequence type, then up to two subsequences are added:
Starting with the potentially pinning piece, going to the end of the sequence.
Starting with the potentially pinning piece, going backwards to the start of the sequence.
member.param: The full sequence to split into potential subsequences for pin analysis.
member.returns: A list of the identified subsequences for further analysis.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.SkewerAnalyzer.FindSkewerOrNull(Artemis.Sequences.Sequence{Artemis.Model.PositionSquare})
member.summary: Finds a pin, if there is one present, in the subsequence.
member.param: The subsequence to check for a pin, where the first element is occupied by the piece doing the pinning.
member.returns: The pin object if a skewer is found. Otherwise, null.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.SkewerAnalyzer.DoesCasualtyPieceHaveLessDefendersThanAttackersAfterSkeweredPieceMoves(Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.Skewer,Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Artemis.Model.Square,System.Int32})
member.summary: Checks the attacker map to see if the skewer actually had much of an effect. It isn't a skewer if the casualty piece can't be captured by the skewering piece.
member.param: The coverage map for the skewering side.
member.returns: True if the given move allows the capture.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.Skewer.SkewerAnalyzer.FindMotifsInPositionAsync(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Artemis.Model.Square,System.Int32})
member.summary: Finds all the skewers in a position.
member.returns: A list of pins.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.SnapshotAnalyzer
member.summary: A helpful base class for analyzers that only need to look at individual positions.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.SnapshotAnalyzer.FindMotifsAsync(Artemis.Model.FlatGame)
member.summary: Implements the FindMotifs method by calling FindMotifsInPosition for each position.
member.returns: A list of motifs as found in each position.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.SnapshotAnalyzer.FindMotifsInPositionAsync(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition)
member.summary: Finds motifs in a given position.
member.param: The position to look for motifs in.
member.returns: An awaitable task with a result containing the list of identified motifs.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.SnapshotAnalyzer.GenerateCoverageMapForPosition(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,Artemis.Model.PieceColor)
member.summary: Generates a map of the number of pieces covering each square for the side to move.
member.param: The position to generate the map for.
The color to generate the map for.
member.returns: The coverage dictionary.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.SnapshotAnalyzer.FindMotifsInPositionAsync(Artemis.Model.FlatPosition,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Artemis.Model.Square,System.Int32})
member.summary: A method to be implemented that finds motifs in a single position.
member.param: A dictionary from each square to the number of attackers on that square by the side to move.
member.returns: A list of applicable motifs.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.TacticalMotif
member.summary: A tactical motif involving winning material or mating.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.TacticalMotif.Type
member.summary: Gets the motif type. For this subclass, it is always Tactical.

member.name: P:Artemis.Tactics.TacticalMotif.TacticType
member.summary: Gets the type of tactical motif.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.TacticalMotifAnalyzer
member.summary: A motif analyzer for tactics.

member.name: M:Artemis.Tactics.TacticalMotifAnalyzer.FindMotifsAsync(Artemis.Model.FlatGame)
member.summary: Finds tactical motifs in a PGN game.
member.returns: A list of found motifs.

member.name: T:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType
member.summary: The type of tactic.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Attraction
member.summary: A move that forces an opponents piece to move before another tactic.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Backrank
member.summary: A move that is not as good if no check made on the back rank is legal.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Breakthrough
member.summary: A tactic that results in the creation of a passed pawn.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Deflection
member.summary: Removing the Guard without a capture.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.DiscoveredAttack
member.summary: Any time a piece is moved that generates a threat of a beneficial capture as defined by the engine.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.DoubleAttack
member.summary: Move that attacks two things.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Intermezzo
member.summary: Material sacrifice that is in between the attacker and defender.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Interference
member.summary: An in between move.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Pin
member.summary: A pin involving the King.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.RelativePin
member.summary: A pin involving a non-King higher-valued piece.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.RemovingTheGuard
member.summary: A sequence of moves that, in reverse order, does not allow winning material.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Skewer
member.summary: Attacking a higher valued piece so that a lower valued piece behind can be captured.

member.name: F:Artemis.Tactics.TacticType.Underpromotion
member.summary: A underpromotion that is the only best move.
